item.title: All the Adventures | Renga in Blue
item.description:
‚ÄúWherein I play and blog about every adventure game ever made in (nearly) chronological order. These are sorted (mostly) in the order I played the games. I think they‚Äôre all worth reading! How‚Ä¶.‚Äù

item.title: Thousand Movie Project
item.description:
‚ÄúI figure the closest I can get to a couple of rigorous film classes is to watch, in chronological order, every movie on an absurdly long and well-curated list ‚Ä¶ the book 1001 Movies You Must See Before You Die.‚Äù
By Alex Sorondo.
Average 900 words.

item.title: Sandwich Tribunal. A sort of sandwich death panel.
